meanings.sent1: I had to endure the long wait at the doctor's office.
meanings.sent2: She had to endure the cold weather during the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: I will endure this boring meeting with a smile on my face.
meanings.sent4: His love for her will endure through all the challenges they face.
meanings.sent5: The old tree continues to endure the harsh winds year after year.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins endure as a reminder of the past.
meanings.sent2: His legacy will endure for generations to come.
meanings.sent3: The old house managed to endure the storm without any damage.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood endure in the heart forever.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of storytelling will endure through the ages.
